metadata.description: Cycles ago, D'Argo was convicted of his wife's murder, a murder committed not by D'Argo but by her Peacekeeper brother. Now, D'Argo is on the hunt for this man. What he will soon discover is that the key to his wife's murder is Raxil. Frelling Raxil. Will D'Argo's greatest irritation prove to be his best hope?
metadata.name: Farscape: Uncharted Tales Vol. 3: D'Argo's Quest
